title: 83/501/EEC: Commission Decision of 29 September 1983 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Perkin- Elmer - Atomic Absorption Spectrophotometer, model 4000' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 29 September 1983
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Perkin-Elmer - Atomic Absorbtion Spectrophotometer, model 4000' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(83/501/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Perkin-Elmer - Atomic Absorbtion Spectrophotometer, model 4000', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 15 March 1983, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 September 1983.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 74, 18. 3. 1982, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
